permissions.message:
HappyHamster works best if you activate your GPS and allow us to store cookies.
You can find out more about how we use cookies under "Legal".
Please also allow access to your location in your internet browser.
permissions.title: Permissions

high.safety-distance: Safe proximity of 1.5m can't be guaranteed.

cookies.forbidden: From now on we will no longer store cookies in your browser. You can change this setting at any time.

gps.default: HappyHamster wasn't able to locate you via GPS because of an unkown error.
gps.not-supported: HappyHamster wasn't able to locate you via GPS because your browser doesn't support it :(
gps.permission-denied: Please allow HappyHamster to locate you. To do that, either reload the page or go to the browser settings.
gps.position-unavailable: HappyHamster wasn't able to locate you via GPS.
gps.timeout: It took too long to locate you via GPS. Please try again.

map.error: An error occurred while updating the map. Sorry :(
map.not-found: Unfortunately, we couldn't find the shop you were looking for :(
map.zoom: Please zoom closer into the map.

occupancy-report.failure: Sorry, that didn't work. Please try again!
occupancy-report.invalid: Please tell us your personal occupancy estimation :)

search.not-found: Sorry, we couldn't find any results for your search term. Please alter your query.
